summary: Going Through the Tracking Protection Tour while function is disabled renders the user to be blocked at step 3/3

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
[Affected versions]:
- Nightly 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- Windows 10x64
- macOS 10.13
- Ubuntu 18.04

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Open Firefox
2. Open a new private window
3. Leave the Tracking Protection toggle to Off
4. Click on the See How it Works
5. Click Next on the first 2 tour slides

[Expected result]:
- The third tour slide should be displayed, and the user should be able to finish the tour after this slide.

[Actual result]:
- When going through the tour with the function disabled, the third tour slide will never be displayed and the user is stuck inside the tour, the site's information being displayed with no interaction option.

[Regression range]:
- Not a regression since its also reproducible on the build where this was introduced, Nightly 2018-06-01

[Additional notes]:
- Activating the feature from the burger menu while being stuck in the tour, will simply add another option to the site information pop-up, but will still leave the user stuck.
- Here is a screencast showing the issue: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zRV0W8VSgdKi4ZTl-QDFKZzm8pqbszCN/view?usp=sharing
